# 📊 Shiny Apps for Econometrics

Welcome!  
This site collects interactive **Shiny apps** I use in my econometrics teaching.  
Each app runs on [shinyapps.io](https://www.shinyapps.io) and is linked below.

---

## IV Bias & Weak Instruments

Explore endogeneity (ρ), instrument strength (γ₁), first stage, reduced form, and the weak-instrument F-test.

## ℹ️ About

These apps are designed for teaching **Econometrics** concepts interactively:  

- 📈 Instrumental Variables  
- 🧮 Standard Errors & Clustering  
- 🎲 Monte Carlo Simulation Evidence  

The source code is openly available on  
[GitHub](https://github.com/felixnoth/Shiny-Econometrics).
